The New York Times Information Bank .A Rothman, J. The New York Times Information Bank is described in detail.  Schedules to be in operation in 1972, this project makes available abstracts of newspaper articles for on-line search and retrieval, combined with microform copies of the original articles. .X 86	1	1364 91	2	1364 124	2	1364 125	1	1364 127	1	1364 129	1	1364 165	1	1364 190	1	1364 191	1	1364 197	1	1364 211	1	1364 214	1	1364 218	1	1364 232	1	1364 243	1	1364 307	1	1364 330	1	1364 375	1	1364 378	1	1364 381	1	1364 406	1	1364 448	1	1364 450	1	1364 451	1	1364 452	2	1364 459	1	1364 468	1	1364 484	2	1364 492	1	1364 508	1	1364 511	2	1364 512	1	1364 514	1	1364 516	1	1364 518	2	1364 520	1	1364 521	1	1364 522	1	1364 523	2	1364 524	1	1364 525	1	1364 526	2	1364 527	1	1364 528	1	1364 529	2	1364 530	1	1364 534	1	1364 546	1	1364 553	1	1364 575	1	1364 579	1	1364 594	1	1364 603	1	1364 604	1	1364 606	1	1364 607	1	1364 609	1	1364 610	2	1364 611	1	1364 612	1	1364 615	1	1364 625	2	1364 626	2	1364 630	1	1364 636	2	1364 637	1	1364 642	1	1364 648	1	1364 650	1	1364 692	1	1364 696	1	1364 699	1	1364 700	1	1364 703	1	1364 705	2	1364 707	1	1364 708	1	1364 725	1	1364 726	1	1364 727	2	1364 728	1	1364 731	1	1364 732	1	1364 733	1	1364 734	1	1364 736	1	1364 738	1	1364 739	1	1364 740	1	1364 741	1	1364 742	1	1364 743	1	1364 744	1	1364 754	1	1364 755	1	1364 812	1	1364 817	2	1364 820	1	1364 824	1	1364 826	1	1364 827	1	1364 875	1	1364 879	1	1364 883	1	1364 992	1	1364 1004	1	1364 1035	1	1364 1057	2	1364 1078	1	1364 1089	1	1364 1091	1	1364 1207	1	1364 1264	1	1364 1269	1	1364 1297	1	1364 1303	2	1364 1327	1	1364 1356	1	1364 1364	5	1364 1366	1	1364 1367	1	1364 1368	2	1364 1370	1	1364 1372	1	1364 1373	1	1364 1374	1	1364 1375	1	1364 1376	1	1364 1377	1	1364 1377	1	1364
